channel.title: I cant freakin connect somebody please help
channel.description: Whenever i try to log onto any server with moparscape it says error connecting to server and then says " press cancel and click start server." so when i do that it creates a new server for me to play on but i cant connect to that either please help me!!!!!! :(

item.title: I cant freakin connect somebody please help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“21 rush 12, post:4, topic:147443”]good server thats 24/7 to try to get on is enkrona.servegame.com

also check if ur firewall is blocking.

and see if u have the latest moparscape client download.

also i advise u change to silabsoft client. most servers are changing to that and unless moparscape updates ull be screwed.[/quote]

no advertising

and it is good and no lag

item.title: I cant freakin connect somebody please help
item.dc:creator: @omfgbbqsauce omfgbbqsauce
item.description:
@omfgbbqsauce wrote:

Well first of all go to the server status page to see if the one your trying is on.

NOTE Not all the servers are on because the owners can shut them off after the update and it shows them online.

Try again.

Read full topic
